nodes.text: Coronet Arms was a weapons manufacturer that manufactured a model of dueling pistols which was typical of such blasters and often ordered in pairs. Coronet Arms engineers modelled the Mark V "Sand Panther" hunting rifle, a popular retirement gift among Corellians, on an ancient rifle once used to hunt Corellian sand panthers. The company shared its name with Coronet City, a city on the planet Corellia.

Coronet Arms was first mentioned in the 2019 canon Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game sourcebook Gadgets and Gear. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Coronet Arms was first mentioned in Suns of Fortune, a 2014 Fantasy Flight Games sourcebook.
